description: This file defines data types, constants, and functions related to admin and management data such as users, departments, teams, activity logs, and certificates within a software project.

methods.name: getUsersByRole
methods.description: Filters platform users by their role.

methods.name: getUsersByManager
methods.description: Retrieves learners managed by a specific manager.

methods.name: getDepartmentById
methods.description: Finds a department by its ID.

methods.name: getTeamById
methods.description: Finds a team by its ID.

methods.name: getUserById
methods.description: Finds a user by their ID.

methods.name: getManagerTeamIds
methods.description: Gets team IDs managed by a specific manager.

methods.name: getLearnersForManager
methods.description: Retrieves learners associated with a manager's teams.
